name: Redford's Movies: Actor and Director Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'The Sting', who was the fellow who got 'stung'?
questions.explanation:
Robert Shaw.

	Great movie. Gould played 'Kid Twist'.

questions.text: In 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid', who was Sundance's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Etta Place.

	Another top movie. Katharine Ross as Etta.

questions.text: In 'Ordinary People', who played the psychiatrist?
questions.explanation:
Judd Hirsch.

	With Mary Tyler Moore. Sutherland was the husband and father.

questions.text: Redford starred in the movie version of 'Barefoot in the Park'. Who wrote the play?
Who shoots and injures Redford in 'The Natural'?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Hershey.

	Close played the 'good', angelic woman.

questions.text: 'A River Runs Through It' features the great outdoors. Where is the movie set?
Redford starred as 'Brubaker'. What was the setting for the movie?
Who was the narrator in 'The Legend of Bagger Vance'?
questions.explanation:
Jack Lemmon.

	The late Jack Lemmon.

questions.text: Which movie did NOT involve Redford?
questions.explanation:
Sunday in New York.

	'Sunday' starred Rod Taylor (before Redford started directing).

questions.text: Who was NOT in 'All The President's Men'?
questions.explanation:
Sidney Poitier.

	Holbrook was 'Deep Throat'. Poitier was in 'Sneakers'.
